trends: There have been no other sightings in Millheim
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy neighbor and I, and his son saw in the southeastern sky, near the brightest star, was what appeared to be a star with a spotlight shining from it in a v shape. Then it appeared as it was getting foggy and it got dimmer until it disappeared. We only got to see it for a few seconds. I was reaching for my camera phone, but it was gone before I could get it out. It was stationary in the sky. It looked just like a star, that switched on a spotlight and then the whole thing just faded away.
